titleStmt.title: An ansvver to the declaration of the House of Commons of the 11. of February 1647 In which they expresse the reasons for their resolutions for making no more addresses, nor receaving any from His Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Digby, Kenelm, Sir, 1603-1665.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Sir Kenelm Digby by Wing (CD-ROM edition).
Place of publication suggested by Wing (CD-ROM edition).
First and last leaves are blank.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
